MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY15 postcode areas of Cupar. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:30pm to make a repair to an underground cable fault on Provost Wynd and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:50pm on 15th November 2020.
